policy.description: Keywords may be AI-generated at document creation time. New keywords are first added as candidates and later reviewed and promoted to the approved state.

items.label: Ambivalence
items.description: The coexistence of opposing tendencies, feelings, or attitudes within the same subject.

items.label: Inner tension
items.description: Experienced psychological tension arising from internal contradictions or conflicts.

items.label: Existential choice
items.description: Moments of decision where an individual confronts freedom, responsibility, and meaning.
